While Dead by Daylight is an extremely rewarding and progressive game. the game suffers from being repetetive at times. and while DLC is always fun to keep players interested. Starbreeze studios is known for releasing too much DLC, which hurts the game. Im having trouble deciding what t give this game. but for now its a delightful game.

[h1]Love-hate-love relationship [/h1]

You are now reading an opinion on a match-based arena multiplayer game Dead By Daylight. And, of course, there’s can’t be not polarised perspectives of players.

I was looking into Dead by Daylight for a long time, because I’m really buying the idea of being a part of slasher film climax. The point of a game is plain and simple: escape a maniac on a killing spree, or be that one psychopath on a loose, who hunts and torments unfortunate teens for the sake of outworld evil.

The setting alone worth a try, but not being a competitive person, I’ve waited for some free weekend to try it myself. 

[h1]Love. [/h1]
Stealth-based mechanic while playing a survivor can compete with other games. Step lightly, don’t make a sound, keep a keen eye and an ear, while at the same time complete objectives. Adrenaline pumps, as you just have to assume that you’re dead if you’re found. 

Big part of game’s immersion is a sound. It will give you chills, considering how game designers incorporate sound effects and music into the game. 

Random generated arenas keep your gameplay fresh. Additionally, killers’ distinct abilities and play styles are putting you in pretty different situations. That been said, developers seems like continuously working on a new stuff: new maniacs, new arena themes etc. 

[h1]Hate. [/h1]
General art direction is kinda dull, nothing memorable to please your eye. Same goes for character design: most of great looking villains are licensed IPs like Mike Mayers or pig-masked Amanda from Saw. 

Perk and levelling system is simple, still far from good. Combination of few of most useful perks will lead to unstoppable omnipotent killing machine (from either side). And a level of your character is hardly considered in matchmaking (game has rank system for it, that has nothing to do with levelling).

This leads us to bigger issue - it’s hard for newcomers. You don’t have sandbox to try things or any tutorial (Keep an eye on the news - devs promised training wheels mode soon). Newbie’s only option is to dive into this troubled world and hope for a match with same skilled folks.

And as we talking about matchmaking, here’s the core problem of Dead by Daylight - assholes. Yes, famous DBD toxic community with teabagging, facecamping, trolling, leavers, foul mouths and no dignity whatsoever. It’s might be more and half of players care only about rank, points and their fragile egos. 

[h1]Love.[/h1]
But after all I still bought the game. Toxicity doesn’t bother me at all, as the game does not intend any verbal communications during match, only after. If I got not brightest teammates or facecamping asshole killer - match will end very fast for me (as dying is easy). In the next one I will find folks, who like to play the way, it was designed: like a haunting horror movie you are a part of. There are such great players, that you can feel a joy of completing goal or your own pounding heart, as you are unfortunate sole survivor and see the escape root. Dammit, it’s great.
MUITO BOM, RECOMENDO!!!!!

晦暗恶灵窃窃私语，无边寂静溢满夜空。
深渊之人暗处凝视，丧者钟声悠然回响。
电锯之声由远及近，鸣喘哀嚎逐渐清晰。
童谣歌声坠入梦境，摇篮之曲难以入眠。
电击惨笑心智不再，竖锯面罩重重考验。
陷阱静置等待猎物，厄咒加身希望难寻。
绝处境地燃起篝火，迷途羔羊围坐其间
熬过黑夜即是黎明？毅然赴死便能解脱？
逃生之人不再欣喜，被献祭者放弃挣扎。
终局皆为噩梦一场，无限轮回早已明示：
黑夜之后仍是黑夜，死亡之时绝非解脱。

If the base game wasn't fun it would be not recommended.

I would have recommended this game if it wasn't for the dumb Pay 2 Win Characters such as all of the DLC characters. Especially for the Killers. If you play this game as the default characters against default characters, this game is great and really fun! You have a fair chance to win on both sides. If you buy the DLC Killers you literally pay to win games.

The DLC Killers have really broken mechanics that allow them to Camp with ease, kill you easily, and outrun and sometimes even 1 shot you. I have to put this as a don't buy this game or the dlc as its not really worth it as it ruins the whole point of a fair match.

[h1]幾度も繰り返す、殺人鬼からの逃走[/h1]

[table][tr][th]総評[/th][td]圧倒的脅威者から逃れるホラー鬼ごっこ[/td][/tr][/table]

[list]
[*]公式に日本語完全対応
[*]ストーリー性はなく、繰り返される殺戮と逃走
[*]プレイヤーランクとスキルビルドの戦略性
[/list]

4人の生存者と1人の殺人鬼。
追う者と追われる者の王道な非対称マルチプレイヤーゲーム。

[h1]目的はただ逃げ延びる事、殺し尽くす事[/h1]

生存者は霧に包まれた箱庭空間に放り込まれ、
どこから襲い掛かって来るか分からぬ殺人鬼からの逃亡を目指す。

殺人鬼から逃れつつマップに点在する発電機を5つ修理し、
脱出ゲートを起動させて逃げ出すことが生存者の目標だ。

殺人鬼の目的は生存者を狩りだし殺し尽くす事。
切り刻んだ哀れな被害者を、屠殺される家畜のように吊し上げるか
地べたを這いつくばり失血死していく様を見届ける。

どちらもプレイヤーが操作していることから、
一度しかないプレイ体験がそこに生まれる。

キャラクターをどれだけ育てたかによって、
個々のスキルビルドが異なってくるが、
懸念されるようなプレイヤー間格差はあまり感じられない。

プレイヤー数の供給が十分な現在は
上手くそのあたりのバランスが取れているように感じる。

[h1]ビジュアルとサウンド、操作性[/h1]

ビジュアルはホラー作品なだけあり全体を通じて陰鬱。
被害者は血を流すし、死に怯える表情まで見える。
ゲーム性と雰囲気がバランスよく描かれている。

サウンドは殺人鬼に合わせた演出があり、
恐怖からくる生存者の心音には否応なく緊張させられる。
重傷を負った際の凄惨な悲鳴も良く出来ている。

操作性はマウス/キーボードでも、コントローラーでも
どちらも不満なくプレイできるだろう。
操作コマンドにも複雑なものはなく、文句ない。

[h1]プレイするべきか否か[/h1]

マルチプレイヤー型のホラーゲームであり、
スキル制度が実装されていることを踏まえると
誰にでもはオススメ出来ない。

[olist]
[*]ホラー、直接的な暴力表現に耐えられること
[*]対人戦をひたすら繰り返すゲームで構わないこと
[/olist]
この2点が大丈夫であることが必須。

1人でプレイしても十分楽しいが、
4人一緒にプレイするフレンドを用意できればさらに楽しい。

非対称マルチプレイヤーのお手本となるゲームだろう。
Игра стоит своих денег но есть минусы ака кемперинг тунелинг да и однообразность игры может надоесть

판자에 끼고, 누르면서 판자를 넘기는데도 서서 판자를 넘기고

이 게임은 인성존, 뚜벅이들의 버프, 인성질유저 처단
이렇게만 되어도 정말 할만해지겠죠

너스는 애초 블링크로 지형을 씹고 들어가고
헌트리스는 도끼를 던져 장거리로 견제가 가능하며
힐빌리는 전기톱질주로 맵을 헤집고 다니는게 가능합니다

그게 아니더라도 한 번 쫓을 때마다 판자를 빼고도 손쉽게 쫓아갈 수 있게 되지요

Nach über 500 Spielstunden lässt sich DBD für mich in einem Wort beschreiben: HASSLIEBE! <3

Ich finde das Spiel macht insgesamt wirklich sehr viel Spaß. Das große Problem an Multiplayer Games insgesamt gesehen sind aber leider die Mitspieler..... Survivor/Teammates und Killer - beide Seiten nehmen sich da nicht die Butter vom Brot. 
Es gibt Zeiten da habe ich von diesem ganzen Campen, Tunneln, Ragequiten und Teabagging so die Nase voll, dass ich das Spiel manchmal wochenlang nicht anrühren kann, weil das einem echt den Spielspaß nehmen kann. Natürlich kann man noch SWF spielen, allerdings darf man je nach Teamstärke verdammt LANGE auf eine Lobby warten oder auf einen Killer der überhaupt mit Premates spielen will....

Aber wie oben bereits geschrieben: Hassliebe! <3
Wenn auf beiden Seiten fair gespielt wird und auch im Aftergame Chat nicht so kindsköpfig provoziert würde, wäre es ein super Spiel. Man kann so viel ausprobieren - Killer, Survivor, Perks, SWF, KYF und natürlich bringen die neuen Chapter auch regelmäßig Abwechslung rein. Zudem wird mit Version 2.0 jetzt auch bald ein Shop mit neue Skins eingepflegt, welche im PTB schon sehr nice aussahen :3

Natürlich gab und gibt es auch immer mal wieder Bugs. Welche ich aber größtenteils eher witzig finde. Da sich dadurch manchmal lustige Situationen ergeben, die man vorher nicht erwartet hätte x'D Okay, vielleicht verliert man auf Grund eines Bugs die Runde. Na und? Dafür hatte ich etwas zu lachen. Von daher finde ich es nicht so wild wie so manch anderer :) Es ist und bleibt nun mal nur ein Spiel.

Alles in allem ein tolles Spiel, welches ich jederzeit weiter empfehlen würde.
Buen juego. Divertido, y eso que no soy amante del terror.

I wanted to actually get into this game, like in a competitive sense, but it's just too toxic to take it seriously anymore.

The game is melee-based, multiplayer, whack/smack 1 killer vs. 4 survivor gamemode where no matter you like it or not, you're played comp kiddo.
People will sweat this game hard, and when they go up against somebody better than them, or atleast somebody more experienced, sweat turns to tears. I used to really enjoy the game, it felt balanced, even as a killer main. If you truly tried, and had a good crowd control going against the other players, you could really win games well. But once you get to even rank 5/20, your matched with people at maximum seasonal rank, who have played for a long time, because believe it or not, there is definitely a skill curve in the game. And the matchmaking is horrible, even with tens of thousands of people playing, you're matching with people who have passed the curve and have proven they're amongst those of the players who can efficiently play the game.

 It's not pay-to-win, but the thing is.. there's literally only 1 mode, and the only different way you're playing it is whether you're a survivor or killer. There's daily challenges and shit like that, but it doesn't fill the void that is the fact the multiplayer aspect of the game is the only reason people can find entertainment in it, because once you've gotten a well-based account/inventory of perks going on, you're literally just left to troll people and even watching people cry can get boring. Every game, every map, every objective, is the fucking same. You would hope after 2-3 years they would another mode where you're not just fixing generators, and opening doors (aka holding F), but rather doing something where communication in your team is required, whether it be standing on special plates to open doors whilst a killer tries to stop you. It's dull gameplay, and like I've mentioned before, multiplayer aspect is the only reason it's still going.

TLDR: Boring piece of shit, same gamemode, only variation is your role in the game, and even the multiplayer aspect gets boring to the point of needing to troll players to get any sense of excitement/entertainment. Don't bother unless you can get it for like under 10$ on G2A/Steam.

Наиграл 20 часов, из них 19 висел на крюке первым. Игра конечно хорошая, но я умираю первым, поэтому говно!

-Игра уровня F2P параши. Но при этом она платная, и чтобы купить новых маньяков или сурвов надо опять платить деньги))))) Все новые персонажи платные за реал. Купи, купи, купи. Что ещё ждать от пейдей дебилов.
-2018 год, тип подключения P2P))) Сука, даже более нищие разработчики умудряются сделать сервера, но только не эти жадные ублюдки. Игре 2 года, у них до сих пор нет серверов, отсюда очень частые лаги и нет возможности переподключения, потому что переподключаться некуда))))))))
-Баланса нет. Половина перков в игре не нужны вообще. Зачем другие маньяки и НАЕД, когда можно взять кожанное лицо и ложить любого дебила с 1 удара? Или несколько дебилов, потому что у него 360 градусов удар))))
-БП-шки. Ты можешь очко рвать за сурва чтобы выжить и получить 20к. Или же ты просто можешь взять маньяка и почти ничего не делав получить 25к)))
-Оптимизация отвратительная. Графика отвратительная.
-Комьюнити тупейшие животные. Когда маньяк чейзит одного сурва - сурвы орут что это туннелинг и плачут) Когда маньяк не отходит от того, кого повесил - сурвы орут, что это кемпинг и плачут) По их логике, маньяк должен им поддаваться))))))))) Ало, игрой так задумано, маньяк обязан убить, и как он это делает вообще никого не должно ебать.

Итого: 3/10. Как фри ту плей параша пойдёт, но платить за неё деньги никому не советую.

It's a great competitive asymmetrical horror game. But after some time all players adapt and stop being afraid of the killer because they are learning about mechanics and what about this game actually.
Overall - enjoy wins, be ready to lose and learn from it and don't get tilted cause of it even if some real crap happened. Just chill and play next game. Don't be toxic - there are enough people and mechanics that may inspire you to do so.
Have fun <3
